thread.title: Rescued Goat Is In Love With The UPS Driver
thread.title_full: Rescued Goat Is In Love With The UPS Driver

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Rescued Goat Is In Love With The UPS Driver
text:
Rescued Goat Is In Love With The UPS Driver   
Love can show up in the most unexpected places. Meet Pearl, an 18-year-old rescue goat who lives at an animal sanctuary and is in love with the UPS delivery man. Pearl lives at The Gentle Barn and despite her age, still has a lot of life left in her, especially when the UPS driver shows up. 
The sanctuary workers say when she hears the truck coming she stops what sheâ€™s doing and runs out to greet the driver, who always has peanut butter treats to give her. 
Watch and share this cute love story with your friends and family.
